Forum The Global Community Advancing Virtual Care
Forum header image
Explore topics such as health equity, healthcare transformation and innovation, hospital-based virtual care, virtual primary care and more—plus insights from a global roster of presenters. Featured sessions include:
The future of Medicare with Meena Seshamani, MD, PhD As the largest single purchaser of healthcare, Medicare is a source of transformation across the health system. Meena Seshamani, MD, PhD, Deputy Administrator and Director of the Center for Medicare, Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services (CMS), discusses the agency’s efforts to advance health equity, expand access, drive innovation toward whole-person care and improve outcomes. Learn more <[[https://teladochealth.com/resources/video/forum-2022-medicare-future/?utm_source=marketo&utm_medium=email&utm_content=gs1c&utm_term=non-registrant]]>
What you need to know about virtual-first benefit plans A virtual-first health plan with embedded virtual primary care can be game-changing for those looking to curb rising healthcare costs, while optimizing their benefit offerings. Leaders at Aon, Priority Health and Trustmark Health discuss the best strategies for delivering virtual-first health plans to employers and individuals. Learn more <[[https://teladochealth.com/resources/video/forum-2022-virtual-benefit-plans/?utm_source=marketo&utm_medium=email&utm_content=pp6&utm_term=non-registrant]]>
Enhancing the inpatient experience with virtual nursing Learn how Saint Luke's Health System established one of the world's first virtual nursing units—and how this innovative approach to the inpatient care model has addressed workforce challenges, improved patient and nurse satisfaction, and increased efficiencies. Learn more <[[https://teladochealth.com/resources/video/forum-2022-inpatient-virtual-nursing/?utm_source=marketo&utm_medium=email&utm_content=ss5&utm_term=non-registrant]]>
FORUM SESSIONS Forum 2022 may be over, but you can access many sessions on demand for up to 90 days.
Access on-demand content now <[[https://forum2022.teladochealth.com/?utm_source=marketo&utm_medium=email&utm_content=es&utm_term=non-registrant]]>
